function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited investigation of the challenge of meeting human use and biodiversity conservation in a limited space","Impact":"Lack of understanding may lead to ineffective green space design and management","Mitigation":"Conducting in-depth research to understand the complex relationships involved in green space design","Technologies":"Advanced research methodologies to study the synergistic effects on mental health and wildlife support","People":"Researchers, urban planners, and environmental conservationists","Owner":"Research institutions, governmental organizations, and environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for multiple dimensions under a socioecological-systems perspective","Impact":"Failure to capture the complexity involved in human-animal-environment relationships","Mitigation":"Integration of socioecological-systems perspective in future research and urban planning","Technologies":"Data analytics, modeling, and interdisciplinary collaboration","People":"Researchers, urban planners, and environmental conservationists","Owner":"Research institutions, academic departments, and urban planning authorities"}]}
